name: impassable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An impassable road or path cannot be travelled on because of bad weather conditions or because it is blocked: Many roads were flooded and impassable following the storm. Synonym
blockedOpposite
passable

Add to word list
(esp. of a road) impossible to travel on or over: Mudslides made the coast highway impassable.
